overview_of_class: In this course, we will read stories of magic, mystery, miracles, and marvels. Readings will come from the dastan and qissa traditions - sometimes called romances, epics, or adventure stories - as well as from their modern descendants, science fiction and thrillers. Our emphasis will be on reading and writing in Urdu and Hindi, but there will also be substantial speaking and listening components.
name: Hindi-Urdu IV: Topics in Advanced Hindi-Urdu
subject: HIND_URD
